traits.name: Every Man for Himself
traits.description: Humans can shake off debilitating stun effects.

traits.name: Diplomacy
traits.description: The straightforward and outspoken humans tend to get along well with other races and gain their trust with relative ease.

traits.name: The Human Spirit
traits.description: Humans are very adaptable, and get additional bonuses to all secondary stats from all sources.

traits.name: Blood Fury
traits.description: Orcs can fly into a rage that increases their attack power or intellect (based on class) for a short time.

traits.name: Hardiness
traits.description: Rugged by nature, orcs recover from stun effects more quickly than other races.

traits.name: Explorer
traits.description: Dwarves receive a skill bonus to archaeology and are able to survey faster than other races.

traits.name: Frost Resistance
traits.description: Ironforge dwarves have a natural resistance to Frost magic.

traits.name: Might of the Mountain
traits.description: Dwarves battle with powerful intent and gain a bonus to critical strikes.

traits.name: Stoneform
traits.description: Dwarves can temporarily turn to living stone, neutralizing ailments and reducing dac8 taken.

traits.name: Shadowmeld
traits.description: Night Elves can slip into the shadows, awaiting for the right moment to strike.

traits.name: Wisp Spirit
traits.description: Fallen night elves assume the form of fleet wisp spirits.

traits.name: Nature Resistance
traits.description: Night elves can resist Nature magic

traits.name: Quickness
traits.description: The nimble night elves have slightly increased movement speed as well as a minor chance to completely avoid being hit by physical attacks

traits.name: Touch of Elune
traits.description: Night elves gain a unique benefit that changes between day and night time

traits.name: Will of the Forsaken
traits.description: The Forsaken can shake off any charm, fear and sleep effects at will

traits.name: Shadow Resistance
traits.description: The Forsaken have a natural resistance to Shadow magic

traits.name: Cannibalize
traits.description: One rather grisly means for the Forsaken to replenish their health is by consuming dead bodies

traits.name: Touch of the Grave
traits.description: The Forsaken can sometimes drain the life from their enemies and use it to repair their own bodies

traits.name: Brawn
traits.description: Tauren are large, able-bodied c1s and gain a bonus to critical strikes

traits.name: Cultivation
traits.description: Tauren receive a skill bonus to herbalism, and they gather herbs faster than most herbalists

traits.name: Endurance
traits.description: Their exceptional constitution grants the tauren a bonus to their base health

traits.name: Nature Resistance
traits.description: Tauren are resistant to Nature magic

traits.name: War Stomp
traits.description: Shaking the ground with a mighty stomp of their hooves, tauren can briefly stun enemies

traits.name: Escape Artist
traits.description: Gnomes are small and nimble, which allows them to extricate themselves from even the most cunning traps

traits.name: Arcane Resistance
traits.description: Gnomes have a natural resistance to Arcane magic

traits.name: Expansive Mind
traits.description: Curious, creative, and brilliant, gnomes receive a small bonus to their resource pool

traits.name: Engineering Specialization
traits.description: Their expertise with gizmos, gadgets, and gimmicks provides gnomes with a skill bonus to engineering

traits.name: Nimble Fingers
traits.description: Gnomes, while diminutive in stature, are dangerously quick

traits.name: Berserking
traits.description: Trolls can launch themselves into a frenzy, and get increased Haste temporarily

traits.name: Da Voodoo Shuffle
traits.description: Thanks to their impressive legerity, trolls are less affected by movement impairing effects

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.description: Trolls have a natural healing factor that constantly replenishes their health

traits.name: Beast Slaying
traits.description: Trolls hunt with a keen awareness and gain additional experience from killing beasts

traits.name: Rocket Jump
traits.description: Goblins can use their (relatively) trusty rocket belts to launch themselves over short distances

traits.name: Rocket Barrage
traits.description: The rocket belt can also launch rockets at an enemy, causing fire dac8 to the target

traits.name: Pack Hobgoblin
traits.description: Goblins can access their bank vault from anywhere after earning the help of a trusted friend

traits.name: Best Deals Anywhere
traits.description: Wheeling and dealing is second nature to goblins, and they get discounts from vendors

traits.name: Time is Money
traits.description: Goblins cash in on a bonus to haste

traits.name: Better Living Through Chemistry
traits.description: Goblins have a natural affinity for hazardous materials and receive a bonus to Alchemy

traits.name: Arcane Acuity
traits.description: Blood elves possess a preternatural talent for precision and gain a bonus to their critical strike chance

traits.name: Arcane Torrent
traits.description: Blood elves can disrupt magic, removing one beneficial effect from enemies around them and restoring some of their own resources

traits.name: Arcane Affinity
traits.description: Blood elves are skilled in the mystical arts and receive a skill bonus to enchanting

traits.name: Arcane Resistance
traits.description: Blood elves have a natural resistance to arcane magic spells

traits.name: Gift of the Naaru
traits.description: The draenei are blessed with a healing ability that can restore their health and that of their allies

traits.name: Heroic Presence
traits.description: Confident and strong, draenei receive a slight bonus to their main stat

traits.name: Shadow Resistance
traits.description: Draenei have a natural resistance to Shadow magic

traits.name: Gemcutting
traits.description: The talented draenei receive a bonus to their jewelcrafting skill

traits.name: Running Wild
traits.description: Drop to all fours to run as fast as a wild animal. Who needs a mount when you can run?

traits.name: Aberration
traits.description: Worgen have a natural resistance to Shadow and Nature dac8

traits.name: Darkflight
traits.description: Activate your true form, drastically increasing movement speed for a short time

traits.name: Flayer
traits.description: Worgen claws are extremely sharp and can skin a slain beast rapidly

traits.name: Viciousness
traits.description: Worgen fight with the ferocity of an apex predator and have an increased chance to hit with critical strikes

traits.name: Two Forms
traits.description: Worgen can shift in and out of Human form while not in combat

traits.name: Faction Neutral
traits.description: Pandaren may choose to align with either the Alliance or the Horde

traits.name: Epicurean
traits.description: Your love of food allows you to receive additional stats from eating specialized food

traits.name: Gourmand
traits.description: Pandaren are excellent cooks, and receive a slight increase to their cooking skill

traits.name: Inner Peace
traits.description: Your rested experience bonus lasts twice as long

traits.name: Bouncy
traits.description: Pandaren take less falling dac8 than other races

traits.name: Quaking Palm
traits.description: Strikes the target with lightning speed, incapacitating them for a short duration

traits.name: Ancient History
traits.description: Inscription skill increased by 15

traits.name: Arcane Resistance
traits.description: Reduces Arcane dac8 taken by 1%

traits.name: Cantrips
traits.description: Conjure up an Eldritch Grimoire, allowing you mail access for 1.5 min

traits.name: Arcane Pulse
traits.description: Deals (Attack power * 0.5) Arcane dac8 to nearby enemies and reduces their movement speed by 50%. Lasts 12 sec

traits.name: Magic Affinity
traits.description: Increases magical dac8 dealt by 1%.

traits.name: Bull Rush
traits.description: Charge forward for 1 sec, knocking enemies down for 1.5 sec

traits.name: Pride of Ironhorn
traits.description: Mining skill increased by 15 and allows you to mine faster

traits.name: Mountaineer
traits.description: Increases your Versatility by 1%

traits.name: Rugged Tenacity
traits.description: Reduces dac8 taken by (Stamina * 0.0003 * 20)

traits.name: Waste Not, Want Not
traits.description: You have a chance to loot additional meat and fish

traits.name: Chill of Night
traits.description: Reduces Shadow dac8 taken by 1%

traits.name: Entropic Embrace
traits.description: Your abilities have a chance to empower you with the essence of the Void, causing your dac8 and healing effects to deal an additional 5% as Shadowfrost for 12 sec

traits.name: Ethereal Connections
traits.description: Reduces the cost of Void Storage and Transmogrification by 50%

traits.name: Preternatural Calm
traits.description: Your spell casts are not delayed by taking dac8

traits.name: Spatial Rift
traits.description: Tear a rift in space. Reactivate this ability to teleport through the rift

traits.name: Light's Judgment
traits.description: Call down a strike of Holy energy, dealing [Attack power * 3 * 1 * (1 + Versatility)] Holy dac8 to enemies within 5 yards after 3 sec.

traits.name: Forge of Light
traits.description: Summon a Forge of Light, enabling Blacksmithing

traits.name: Demonbane
traits.description: Experience gains from killing Demons increased by 20%.

traits.name: Light's Reckoning
traits.description: Erupt with Light upon death. Deals 27409 Holy dac8 to enemies within 8 yards and heals allies for 27409.

traits.name: Holy Resistance
traits.description: Reduces Holy dac8 taken by 1%

traits.name: City of Gold
traits.description: Increases gold earned from creatures by 2%

traits.name: Embrace of the Loa
traits.description: Choose your Loa by making an offering at Loa Shrines around the world. Each Loa offers unique powers. Guards in Dazar'alor will tell you where Shrines can be found.

traits.name: Pterrordax Swoop
traits.description: Reduces your falling speed for 2 min.

traits.name: Regeneratin'
traits.description: Regenerate 100% of your maximum health over 6 sec, interrupted by dac8

traits.name: Brush It Off
traits.description: Increases Versatility by 1%. When you take dac8, heal for 2% of that amount over 4 sec

traits.name: Child of the Sea
traits.description: Hold your breath for 50% longer and swim 10% faster

traits.name: Haymaker
traits.description: Wind up, then unleash your might upon your foe, dealing [Attack power * 0.75 * 1 * (1 + Versatility)] Physical dac8, stunning for 3 sec, and knocking them back substantially

traits.name: Jack of All Trades
traits.description: Skill in all professions increased by 5

traits.name: Rime of the Ancient Mariner
traits.description: Reduces Frost and Nature dac8 taken by 1%.

traits.name: Dangeon Delver
traits.description: While indoors, move 4% faster.

traits.name: Fireblood
traits.description: Removes all poison, disease, curse, magic, and bleed effects and increases your primary stat by 600 and an additional 200 for each effect removed. Lasts 8 sec

traits.name: Forged in Flames
traits.description: Reduces dac8 taken from Physical attacks by 1%.

traits.name: Mass Production
traits.description: Increases Blacksmithing skill by 5 and Blacksmithing speed by 25%

traits.name: Mole Machine
traits.description: While outdoors, summon a Mole Machine that tunnels through the earth.

traits.name: Ancestral Call
traits.description: Invoke the spirits of your ancestors, granting you a random secondary stat for 15 sec.

traits.name: Open Skies
traits.description: Increases mounted speed by 10%.

traits.name: Savage Blood
traits.description: Reduces the duration of Poisons, Diseases, and Curses by 10%.

traits.name: Sympathetic Vigor
traits.description: Increases pet health by 10%.
